directions: Combine diced tomatoes, water, kidney beans, corn, rotini, tofu, wheat germ, and hot pepper sauce in a pot; bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until rotini are tender, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen corn, or more to taste
1/4 cup wheat germ, or more to taste
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
title: Healthy Mexican Soup
